Articles.Content:
Any of the following objectives can be achieved on their own, you don't have to follow the order.

1. Establish Space Station over Kerbin 5 points

2.Have a delta-V more then 4000 without stages 5 points

3. Establish an orbit around a planet or dive in for aerobreaking 10 points

Route 1:After diving in to the planet manage to aerobrake(Parachutes or normal Drag, hell you can use wings) and land. 15 points

Route 1.2: Have a module that leaves behind the habitation modules, and takes the astronoughts back home.15 points

Route 2. After have established an orbit send down the modules you wish to send down 5 points, if this can be done on celestial objects without atmospheres + 10

Route 2.2: Re-establish the base down on the surface of the target 5 Points.

Route 2.3: Have a module that leaves behind the habitation modules, and takes the astronoughts back home.15 points

Submissions will be accepted in the forms of video and fotograph with explanations no longer than 500 words.

The points given above are for perfection, a percentage of the the total you have achieved will be given depending on your performance.

Now to break the formal mood smilies will be posted:
Did the orbital drop thing. Aerobrake into atmosphere working on it

I've edited your poll options, kamisis12. In the future, please try to ensure that they are suitable, readable and not all in caps..

Thanks.
Sorry kamisis12, but you need to work on your challenges a bit more yet, and attempt them yourself to see if it's any fun or not
